titleStmt.title: The images of a verye Chrysten bysshop, and of a couterfayte bysshop
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.
Marshall, William, fl. 1535.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by Wyllyam Marshall [i.e. Robert Wyer,

notesStmt.note: Loosely derived from "Wider den falsch genantten geystlichen stand des Bapst" by Martin Luther.
Marshall's name from colophon; he is in fact the adapter of Luther's work. Conjectured publication date from STC; Wyer's mark appears on title page verso.
Identified as STC 16963 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
